main event: Multiple sightings of unidentified aerial objects were reported in Artesia, New Mexico, during January 1951.
interesting points: Two large objects flying at a constant altitude were observed moving at high speeds and making abrupt turns., A bright circular light was seen on two separate occasions, disappearing instantly., An observation noted similarities to a half dollar in size with an intense brightness., Sightings involved multiple witnesses including civilians and military personnel., One of the witnesses described the object as disc-shaped with no visible means of propulsion.
sighted object: unidentified aerial objects and bright lights in the sky
witness description: civilians and military personnel in the area
